Title: Extends the effectiveness of the authority of the town of Red Hook to impose real estate transfer taxes and to deposit revenue from such taxes into a community preservation fund
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of the authority of the town of Red Hook to impose real estate transfer taxes and to deposit revenue from such taxes into a community preservation fund.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 443 of the laws of 2006, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the town of Red Hook to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in said community preservation fund, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
